    • Method Detail

      • register

        public Employee register(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.util.Set<Role> roles,
                         boolean active)
                  throws DataAccessException,
                         EmployeeValidatorException
        Inserts a new employee into the application.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the employee to create.
        username - The username of the employee to create.
        password - The password of the employee to create.
        roles - The roles to assign to the employee.
        active - Whether or not the employee can be applied to orders.
        Returns:
        The employee instance representing the newly created employee.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs.
        EmployeeValidatorException - When the provided details are invalid.

      • authenticate

        public Employee authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
                      throws DataAccessException,
                             InactiveEmployeeException
        Attempts to authenticate a employee using the provided email and password.
        Parameters:
        username - The email to authenticate with.
        password - The password to authenticate with.
        Returns:
        The employee who was authenticated. null in case no employee with the provided credentials exist.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs.
        InactiveEmployeeException - When the provided employee is marked inactive.

      • hash

        public static java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String password)
        Hashes the provided password using the b-crypt algorithm.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to hash.
        Returns:
        The resulting digest.
